at.spengergasse.mode

Class Mode

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.spengergasse.mode.Mode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InvadersMode, RoundMode

    public abstract class Mode
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the different gamemodes. Handles the Entity placement, Entity movement, shots.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a new Mode.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mode

        public Mode(int screenX,
            int screenY,
            int[] data,
            Keyboard keyboard,
            int difficulty)
        Constructs a new Mode.
        Parameters:
        screenX - the width of the window
        screenY - the height of the window
        data - the Array, where the different Colors of the Pixels are saved
        keyboard - the keyboard class which is used
        difficulty - the level number

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the different Entities.

      • finished

        public abstract int finished()
        Returns if the game is finished.
        Returns:
        if the game is finished (1 = win; -1 = lose; 0 = unfinished)

        Returns the Player Object.

      • getBoss

        public AdvancedEntity getBoss()
        Returns the Boss Object. If there is no boss = null.
        Returns:
        the Boss Object; no boss = null
